welcome_message_body: Welcome to Assis, Brazil! Get ready to be charmed by this vibrant city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and lively culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Assis has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Assis Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
